column6: SIEGE BLOCKBUSTER TIE-IN!! PART 2 OF 3 Daken has been given glimpses of the life he could have-as well as the lives he might destroy-and the time for a choice is finally at hand. Will he become a force for good...or reign as a king in Hell? Parental Advisory ...$2.99
